723608f-a.title: Manhattan: Union Square (East) - 15th Street.
723608f-a.text:
Union Square East, at, adjoining and south of the S.E. corner of 15th Street.  The corner building is the Union Square Hotel.

1890

Neg. #1309

723618f-a.title: Manhattan: Union Square (East) - 15th Street.
723618f-a.text:
Union Square East, north from and including 15th Street (Fourth Ave, as shown is a continuation of Union Square East).
About 1913.

723609f-a.title: Manhattan: Union Square (East) - 15th Street.
723609f-a.text:
Union Square Hotel. Union Square East on S.E. corner of 15th Street, with adjoining buildings on l5th Street and on Union Square East, newly remodelled by S. Klein for his growing business. The Union Square Hotel was built late in the 1890's on the site or the old residences 14-16-18 Union Square. The l5th Street wing of the S. Klein's enlarged quarters was made by remodelling the newer Hotel America. In the background may be seen the tower of the new Consolidated Gas Building at Irving Place and 14th Street, Completer 1928.
August 4, 1930.
P. L. Sperr.

723611f-a.title: Manhattan: Union Square (East) - 15th Street.
723611f-a.text:
Unnion Square Savings Bank, Union Square East at N.E. corner of 15th Street, with part of the newly remodelled park in the foreground. This edifice was built some time between 1902 and 1910, replacing two old houses; the bank had its original offices in 20 Union Square, on the corner. The 9-story apartment house at 107 East 15th Street,
adjoining the bank, was built about 1900.
August 4, 1930.
P. L. Sperr.
